title: 服务器启动器内存分配
author: 渣楠~
txt_content:
电脑运行内存有8g，给启动器分配4g：   java -Xmx4G -jar CatServer-git-1468a63-Community.jar
启动后：Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4G
The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size.
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.
怎么解决？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 卸载原有的 java ，安装这个 https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... b78b671c754eaaf38ab
